articles.title: Sensex ends 752 pts below, Nifty 17,187 level; bank stocks worst performers, Tech Mahindra shines - The Indian Express
articles.description: IndusInd Bank was the top loser today, as the stock tanked over 7.33 per cent after the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) extended the tenure of its CEO by another two years.

articles.title: HSBC buys SVB's UK business, ending 'nightmare' for British tech - CNN
articles.description: HSBC has scooped up the UK arm of failed Silicon Valley Bank, securing the deposits of thousands of British tech firms that hold money at the lender.
